QuestData.Title: The Mantle Returned
QuestData.Description:
The Mantle of the Primus...
I can hardly believe it. That Gharmal possessed it. That they did not use it against us. That we reclaimed it.
This could prove vital toward our efforts to restore Maldraxxus. We must return it to Baroness Draka at the Seat of the Primus immediately.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Draka at the Seat of the Primus.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Draka at the Seat of the Primus.
QuestData.RewardText: I'll send scouts to continue the search, but this... this is a huge boon for us.
